pages.text: This page is a problem because mod author has created two distinct ways to obtain shulker boxes. You pick one option in the config file.

$(br2)If simple mode (just for the shulker box) is on, player can craft a shulker box from one chest an 8 chorus fruits around it. It's easy to grow chorus fruits and have dozens of shulker boxes, but to get there player needs to find an end portal and activate it - that is quite the quest itself.
$(br2)If simple mode is off, shulker shells are added to end city loot. Player needs to find two shells in end cities to craft a shulker box.
